Apple's App of the Week: Things

Apple's App of the Week: Things — Things is one of the most polished task managers out there, and it’s currently available for free as Apple’s App of the Week. Even if you already have your way of Getting Things Done™, check Things out; it’s fantastic iOS design.

Published 19 November 2014

Enjoy your day.
